author: Tuzi
title: Too small and hard to wash
review:
I purchased this mug on the day of the opening of the new LEGO store in The Hague, The Netherlands for ten bucks.

It's good hard plastic and easy enough to hold, weighs about 116 grams and has a capacity of 240ml. 

And that's about all there is. You can't really put it in the dishwasher because the hollow handle and the hollow bottom trap a lot of water, so hand-washing is unfortunately required. It's nice to have, but I doubt I will be using this myself - It is just too small to hold enough liquids.
